title: Smoking Gunn II
description: Where there’s fire, there’s smoke. Where there’s smoke, there’s Joe Gunn. This time, he’s tracking a killer halfway around the globe. He can’t be stopped and he never quits.
quote: No one talks that way to Joe Gunn.
starring: Nick Lang, Kelly Kalas, D.J. Caruso, Bubba Rubenstein
alt1: a tropical background and a ninja ready to attack
alt2: Gunn looking at a ninja star stuck in the bamboo he’s holding
alt3: a villain-type in front of brightly lit blinds
alt4: a woman grabs a cigarette from Gunn’s mouth
